sentences.en: Fast embarkation , have river heart thief here, cannot long stop.
sentences.cn: 快开船, 此处有江心贼, 不能久停.

sentences.en: French painter noted for his exuberant scenes of gallantry, such as The Embarkation for Cythera ( 1717 ).
sentences.cn: 华都,简·安东尼1684-1721法国画家,以其丰富华丽的场面著称, 如发舟西苔岛 ( 1717年 )

sentences.en: Good, go aboard please, be about very quickly embarkation.
sentences.cn: 好了, 请上船吧, 很快就要开船了.

sentences.en: Lisbon became the great embarkation point.
sentences.cn: 里斯本成了最理想的跳板.

sentences.en: May I have another embarkation card?
sentences.cn: 请再给我一张旅客出境登记表好 吗 ?

sentences.en: On today's cruise ships, you have to have a lifeboat drill within twenty - four hours of embarkation.
sentences.cn: 在现在的游轮上, 你上船 二十四 小时以内就会接受救生艇训练.

sentences.en: Passengers and crew! Follow the lifeboat man to the lifeboat stations on the embarkation deck.
sentences.cn: 旅客和船员注意! 在登艇甲板随舰长登救生艇.
请出示护照和出入境卡.

sentences.en: Please write your address on your embarkation card.
sentences.cn: 请在你的出境申报表上写上你的地址.

sentences.en: Plese give me an embarkation card and custom declarario form.
sentences.cn: 请给我出入境登记卡及海关申报单.
